notesStmt.note: An image of the verso of the leaf is not currently available. The verso is blank.

revisionDesc.change: moved dateline to end of letter, where it appears in the ms
added note about not having image of verso
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p: I have just got your letter i am glad my dear waltWalt you are as well as you are i know its bad enoughf enough to be confined in your room and unable to walk but i am glad to hear your friends is so kind i thought of peter i knew if it was in his power to be with you he would and cherefully cheerfully doo do everything that he could for you) i could wish you was here walter dear but as it cant can't be so i trust you will be restored to your usual health and your dear old mother i am about as i was when you was here the cold weather dont don't affect me so very much) good bie walterWalter dear remember me to peter
write just as you are walterWalter
dont don't say you are better than you are
